name: Druid's Trouble
description:
Pixel Challenge 2018 - The Perfect Storm

During a festive night, two drunk druids fight each other for accidentally opening a time gate. 

Druid's Trouble is a chaotic 1 versus 1 shooter where the rules of the game change continuously, whether you want it or not. 

Controls ( Require two controllers )

Left Stick : Move

RIght Stick : Rotate

R1 : Shoot

Use the A button to navigate through the menu
